courses.name: Intro to Programming
courses.info: An introductory course in programming.

courses.name: C++ Programming
courses.info: A course focused on C++ programming, requiring Intro to Programming as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Statistics
courses.info: A basic statistics course.

courses.name: Calculus
courses.info: A course in calculus.

courses.name: Data Structures
courses.info: An advanced course in data structures, requiring Intro to Programming as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Operating Systems
courses.info: A course covering the fundamentals of operating systems, requiring Intro to Programming as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Introduction to Telecommunications
courses.info: An introduction to telecommunications systems.

courses.name: Ethical Issues in IT
courses.info: A course on ethical issues in the IT industry.

courses.name: Data and Computer Communications
courses.info: A course covering data and communications, requiring Operating Systems as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Applied Cybersecurity
courses.info: A course in applied cybersecurity, requiring Data Structures as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Web Systems I
courses.info: A course focused on web systems, requiring Intro to Programming as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Computer Organization and Design
courses.info: A course on computer architecture and design.

courses.name: Voice and Data Network Design
courses.info: A course focused on designing voice and data networks.

courses.name: Applied Database I
courses.info: A course on database applications, requiring Data Structures as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Software Engineering
courses.info: A course in software engineering concepts.

courses.name: Systems Integration
courses.info: A course in systems integration, requiring Software Engineering as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Human Computer Interfaces
courses.info: A course on human-computer interface design.

courses.name: IT Project Management
courses.info: A course on managing IT projects.

courses.name: Business Writing
courses.info: A course on business writing, focusing on professional communication.

degreeRequirements.notes: Students who have taken ENC2210 may use that course, requiring an additional 3-hour upper-level technical elective.
Students must complete 6 credit hours in one specialization area.

courses.name: Applied Database II
courses.info: A course in advanced database applications, requiring Applied Database I as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Web Systems II
courses.info: A continuation of Web Systems I, requiring Web Systems I as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Introduction to Digital Forensics
courses.info: An introduction to the field of digital forensics.

courses.name: Advanced Digital Forensics
courses.info: An advanced course in digital forensics, requiring the Introduction to Digital Forensics course as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Network Forensics and Incident Response
courses.info: A course on network forensics, requiring Introduction to Digital Forensics as a prerequisite.

courses.name: Security Methods and Practice
courses.info: A course on security methods and practices.
